promote_carpenter.text: On Hearing the Call of the Saw:

logs: It is my turn to wield the saw. Too bad mom always said I was bad with power.
Me, Carpenter? YES!! I've always wanted to make minature chairs!!!
You want me to be the carpenter? Can I... sell the stuff I make? Or is this communal property?
The Saw? Where some people see a tool, I see a serrated weapon. Saw, you are my new best friend.
I shall endeavor to bring the music of the cubes to our furniture.
Me? You want me to be the carpenter? Ok, I'll do my best!
